string-array.name: test_subject_0_0_intro_main
string-array.item: Hey you, can you hear me?
It seems like the neurons are responding to my lovely voice.
I take that as a yes.
Earthling, I would like to welcome you to a journey into the abyss of your mind.

string-array.name: test_subject_0_1_intro_main
string-array.item: This is Dr. Drams.
You would call him a crazy brilliant scientist.

string-array.name: test_subject_0_2_intro_main
string-array.item: A first small and unimportant question. What kind of creature are you actually?
Our highly developed culture doesn\"t know such differences, but we know it is important to you.

string-array.name: test_subject_0_3_intro_main
string-array.item: Alright. Got it. By the way, if you are ready you can start our experiments now!!
Oh, I completely forgot to introduce myself:
I am the Meta creation Transprima Plasmiro Blu Equaris Venalo the 364k.
It is perfectly fine if you call me \"Sublimer\".
Of course you can use other titles to honour me.
For instance \"Your Highness\" or \"Oh prime example of a flawless creature of all galaxies\" are decent, too.
I\"m sorry. I tend to digress very fast.
Back to the topic. My creators and I or to keep it short: We…
… we want to explore earth and get a better understanding of life and its creatures on it.
Our choice generator has chosen you as the chosen one.
You are our testsubject.
That\"s why we had to pick you up with the tractor beam.
We will watch your brain activities and collect all data in the background.
All progress and regress will be saved!
Hopefully you have the potential we saw in you.
At least from some distance you looked like a promising talent…
But looking at close range… I suppose a failing of the Centralbrain…
Well… it would be beneficial if you don’t fail the planet…

string-array.name: test_subject_0_0_intro_nuts
string-array.item: May I introduce our Centralbrain WiseMind to you… We connected your brain to hers.
A brain with the size of a galaxy… and … well … yours right next to it…
I hope you two get along well together and take care of each other.
Well. I mean WiseMind takes care of you.

string-array.name: test_subject_0_1_intro_nuts
string-array.item: Test: Is 13 a prime number?

string-array.name: test_subject_0_2_intro_nuts
string-array.item: Response time exceeded. No reaction detected.
Hmm, maybe we need a simpler question.

string-array.name: test_subject_0_3_intro_nuts
string-array.item: Think about something to eat!

string-array.name: test_subject_0_4_intro_nuts
string-array.item: Ah. Candies.

string-array.name: test_subject_0_5_intro_nuts
string-array.item: Great, as the connection is working, we hopefully can start in a couple of seconds.
I hope that you are not slow on the uptake.
We don\'t want to overwhelm you.
Let\'s see.. Letters: nope… Numbers: negative…
Can you do anything at all?
Let\'s see how it is reacting to pictures…
Aha.. Affinity to colorimetric anomaly
WiseMind, prepare test series 272 for determination and measurement of earthling\'s intelligence.
Earthling, as all following experiments of test series 272 it\'s all about seeing the right picture.
If you are stuck or need some help, please \"Don\'t panic\".
WiseMind will give some customized help, if our infinite intellect is exceeding yours.
Or better: All earthling\'s intellect.
Well then, as you always say: Enter the fray within grand style!
And of course: Good luck!

string-array.name: test_subject_0_riddle_solved_candy
string-array.item: Accomplished
Wonderful
Super
Really good
Unexpected
Great

string-array.name: test_subject_1_0_intro_main
string-array.item: WiseMind told me about some improvements.
If it wasn\'t WiseMind… who would have believed that.
Nevertheless I have to check her assertion.

string-array.name: test_subject_1_1_intro_main
string-array.item: Test: What\'s the 7364th prime number?

string-array.name: test_subject_1_2a_intro_main
string-array.item: No, chocolate is delicious but not a prime number…
Besides, prime number are healthier than chocolate.

string-array.name: test_subject_1_2b_intro_main
string-array.item: No, donuts are primarily holes…

string-array.name: test_subject_1_2c_intro_main
string-array.item: Cookies are files and not numbers…

string-array.name: test_subject_1_3_intro_main
string-array.item: At least your reaction time improved.
Better than nothing. At least a little kind of progress.
Let\'s have another try this time with a sequence of numbers.
What\'s the correct sequel for the numbers:

resources.string-array:
No, no, no. I\'m afraid that\'s wrong.#
The correct solution is 217341.
If you take the earth function:
(18111/2)*XYZ²*XYZ²–90555*XYZ³+(633885/2)*XYZ²-452773*XYZ+217331…
…then you get the previous mentioned solution.
Hmm, I see … you don\'t get it.
Never mind.
So, let\'s continue with the record.

string-array.name: test_subject_1_5b_intro_main
string-array.item: This..this is correct…
Did you know the answer or did you have guess?
I believe the second one.
Can you name the corresponding earth function?
No reaction. As expected.
Just for your information. The function is..
Nevertheless, let\'s continue with the record.

string-array.name: test_subject_1_6_intro_main
string-array.item: If I try loading the protocol right here, we get … Ouch.
Alpha stimulation causes an allergic reaction.
Weird, who would have thought that brains might react like that.
Next step … injection of the ether blocker for sensitization of neuronic matter.
Why do you have that stupid grin on your face?
Ah, cause you didn\'t get it.
I\'m gonna record it.

string-array.name: test_subject_1_intro_nuts
string-array.item: Coming to a conclusion, your reactions are showing the following thing: The earthly IQ is barely above absolute zero.
Homo Sapiens, how is it possible that a species destroys the planet so fast with such little brain?
Wasn\'t a comment in on of these books … wait … ah, right here: \"they know not what they do\"…
Theory confirmed.
Seems like their destructive behaviour was not an evil intention but rather a lack of overview and understanding.
Shall we help them to repopulate the planet again?
Oh you\'re still listening.. I\'m just kidding.

string-array.name: test_subject_1_riddle_solved_candy
string-array.item: Applause
Wow
Well done
Very good
Good job
Nice going

string-array.name: test_subject_2_0_intro_main
string-array.item: As an outsider, what do you think about the subject intelligence?
No reaction.
Again.
That was to be expected.
Nevertheless WiseMind is beside herself.. with enthusiasm.
She claims that she was right from the early beginning.
In my opinion, you just learned what we expected to see.
Kind of cognitive bias.
We noticed that you don\'t know any prime numbers yet.
We absorb prime numbers during the plasma-granulation state.
-it\'s like your breast milk.
Excuse the overestimation of your intellect.

string-array.name: test_subject_2_1_intro_main
string-array.item: Test: What\'s the solution to the P versus NP problem?

string-array.name: test_subject_2_2_intro_main
string-array.item: Sorry? Millennium problem?
After that long time and you still did not find a solution?
Hmmm.. well, then we take a simple test.

string-array.name: test_subject_2_3_intro_main
string-array.item: What\'s the molecular weight of antimatter?

string-array.name: test_subject_2_4a_intro_main
string-array.item: 6? Well … almost correct!
Sigh… the universe alone knows what do with this creature.

string-array.name: test_subject_2_4b_intro_main
string-array.item: Potato salad??
Ugh…
…Hmm…
WiseMind, I think our testsubject needs some stimulation. With high voltage please.
Some neutrons seem to be gone wild.
I can\'t believe it.

string-array.name: test_subject_2_5_intro_main
string-array.item: Looks like when the soup of wisdom was spread, you joined with a fork.

string-array.name: test_subject_2_intro_nuts
string-array.item: By the way, boisterous comments and insults from my part are just a friendly attempt to communicate like earth creatures.
It\'s not easy to downgrade my thoughts and interactions to your level.
But let\'s continue with the protocol now.

string-array.name: test_subject_2_riddle_solved_candy
string-array.item: Remarkable
Great job
Good on you
Impressive
Dead right
Nice shot

string-array.name: test_subject_3_0_intro_main
string-array.item: This time, we gonna spend some time with my favorite subject:
Pi.
The test is pretty simple, even for you.

string-array.name: test_subject_3_1_intro_main
string-array.item: What\s the 84765th digit of Pi?

string-array.name: test_subject_3_2a_intro_main
string-array.item: Close one.5.

string-array.name: test_subject_3_2b_intro_main
string-array.item: A lucky strike!
Even a simple-minded earthling can find the correct solution!

string-array.name: test_subject_3_3_intro_main
string-array.item: Well, what\s the 7530th digit of Pi?

string-array.name: test_subject_3_4b_intro_main
string-array.item: 5?! Is this earthling a creature of luck?
I have to check this.
But.. considering it met us:
Definitely!
But let\'s go on.

string-array.name: test_subject_3_5_intro_main
string-array.item: What\s the 836th digit of Pi?

string-array.name: test_subject_3_6a_intro_main
string-array.item: Wrong. 6. Enough for today. I give up.
Holy creation…
We picked up an intelligence allergy sufferer, didn\'t we?
Well, to be honest, having a quote of 100% right answers would be impossible for your species.
Maybe I would have come to the suspicion of fraud.
But…
Getting fooled by the earthling? Me? Would it be smart enough to fool ME?
Haha. A likely story!

string-array.name: test_subject_3_6b_intro_main
string-array.item: 6. Wow. That\'s right.
Amazing.
Unbelievable!
First, you had my curiosity. Now you have my attention.
.. sorry WiseMind?
You told it ALL the answers?!
Good job, you really scared me for a short moment. I really thought I underestimated the earthling\'s intellect!
Very well. Well played. I have to admit, the prank for my transcendental century succeeded…
By the way, it\'s the century we achieve our full intellectual and meta-spiritual abilities…
In our concentric spheres it\'s a habit to play a trick on all Sublime-beings.

string-array.name: test_subject_3_6c_intro_main
string-array.item: Correct.
You didn\'t answer all questions the right way.
But after all and especially for an earthling, it\'s a first step!

string-array.name: test_subject_3_7_intro_main
string-array.item: Enough stories for today.
But.. considering.. having some smalltalk, I can tell you a curious story that happened to me.
When using the tractor beam for you we picked up a lot of stuff too.
Exactly, you and other garbage was abducted.
By mistake of course!
I had to clear this mess in the first step.
My parents always told me: \"No studies in chaos!\"
..at least it\'s common to do this among us..
Nevertheless, when looking up during my cleanup efforts I was suddenly looking in a face in front of me.
I was surprised reading surprise, disgust and hope for some tasty hay in it.
It was the face of a cow.
Honestly, it\'s very difficult to distinguish you mortal creatures from each other.
Especially human beings.
Some humans have one chin, others two.
Otherwise, you all look the same.

string-array.name: test_subject_3_intro_nuts
string-array.item: I came to a conclusion.
Really understated your reactions to numbers were poor.
Disastrous to be precisely.
Not your strength I guess.
Letters are poor as well..
Although I am an optimist..
.. I\'m not living in a fool\'s paradise.
We will continue and focus our work with pictures.
More potential, less frustration.
That\'s the way.

string-array.name: test_subject_3_riddle_solved_candy
string-array.item: Great work
Beautiful
A sensation
Excellent
Incredible
Proud of you

string-array.name: test_subject_4_0_intro_main
string-array.item: WiseMind is analyzing the evolution gap between earthlings and the remaining creatures of the universe.
Maybe she will find some interesting facts.
Because right now our language developed a curse word regarding the earth\'s inhabitants:
Humanoid Minimalsetup.
Furthermore, we\'re looking for further cognitive deficits of your species.
First results so far:
Arrogance.
Excessive hubris.
Megalomania.
Greed
Antipathy.
I could continue like this.
I\'m sorry but unfortunately this is true.

string-array.name: test_subject_4_1_intro_main
string-array.item: And then, look at me:
Prime example of an unique and intelligent being.
Ingenious.
Adventurous.
A sharp mind.
Caring for lower creatures like you.
And of course quite modest.
I didn\'t get one thing so far.
Why for Cthulhu\'s sake does every earthling want do become an over-earthling?
Maybe an obscured mind is the root that everyone is seeking to come to power.
At least wherever you\'re looking, everyone of the earthlings is trying to be more than possible..
.. or to get more than necessary.
Some of them are telling lies as journalists, other as politicians…
Some are wasting their time accumulating treasures and money..
Others by fighting as tiny groups against huge systems.
..and both are compromising their principles.
Hard to believe that Homo Sapiens on planet earth is calling itself the pride of creation…
I really don\'t know what to say.
They are like animals on two feet:
Deep primate heritage, instinctive actions, the fewest have self reflection, Xenophobia of other people.
As I said, like animals. Eat or be eaten.
Better destroy other people first.
You\'re right WiseMind: Enough generalizing and enough earthling-bashing.

string-array.name: test_subject_4_intro_nuts
string-array.item: My point is:
Humans are all a toast of their own system.
Everyone wants to exceed their own limits again and again.
Becoming bigger and bigger, growing and growing and if you ask, when they want to stop,..
..there is only one answer:
Never.
Good luck with that.
If you were the way we are and be near to perfect, all earthlings would know their limits..
..and we wouldn\'t have this conversation.
I know.
\"Conversation\" means a reaction of the opposite living being.
The only thing that is showing any kind of reaction is your big toe.
Thanks to the current flowing..

string-array.name: test_subject_4_riddle_solved_candy
string-array.item: Big Thumbs-up
TipTop
Fantastic
Magnificent
Brilliant
Unbelievable

string-array.name: test_subject_5_0_intro_main
string-array.item: Last time I exaggerated a bit.
I promised WiseMind to stop calling mankind stupid all the time.
And stop insulting you nonstop.
At least no obvious insults anymore.
However this does not mean that I must stop calling you names. I\'m going to be more creative.
You can think about everything and complain afterwards.

string-array.name: test_subject_5_1_intro_main
string-array.item: Talking about it.. I realized yesterday..
..your fellow earthling creatures are running different experiments on inferior living beings…
That\'s what we do, too!
For instance with you.
However our experiments always try to determine the living beings\'s intellect!
Well, in the majority of cases. If existing.
And if the creatures are not struggling like this..
I really try my best to increase my motivation.
With you, it is a true challenge.
Oh, by the way, one important question to you.
I know that children are in some kind of developing stage and need to learn a lot of things.
But why, just why, are fully grown earthlings that stupid?
Sorry.
I wanted to say:
Why are physical and cognitive fully-grown humans an evolution brake of the steady evolution?

string-array.name: test_subject_5_intro_nuts
string-array.item: Intellectual strafers becoming politicians due to a lack of alternatives, easy to understand.
But everyone else?
Could explore your own solar system…
…or the sun.
Improve their intellect instead of working on your own elimination…
Homo Sapiens.. crafting weapons which could extinguish themselves.
What kind of creature cuts of the lim it is sitting on?
Oh yeah. Homo Sapiens!
…\"the wise earthling\"…
I see.. I cannot control my temper anymore.
All these tests irritated my vein-shield too strong.
I need to ask WiseMind for some help.
The earth pressure is still new to me.

string-array.name: test_subject_5_riddle_solved_candy
string-array.item: A doozie
Bravo
Admirable
Outstanding
Genius
Dead right

string-array.name: test_subject_6_0_intro_main
string-array.item: WiseMind gave me some special medical treatment.
Now I\'m feeling well again!
Being motivated and full of actions we took a closer look on your colour vision.
As new knowledge was very poor..
..we want to expand our studies in the deep corners of your mind again.
I really hope to find some valuable stuff.
Because the convergence so far…
..is not even close to match with our knowledge.
This means you know nothing.
Well, OK. Being an obvious prime creature wouldn\'t get me any award.

string-array.name: test_subject_6_1_intro_main
string-array.item: But what I am trying to say:
We know something because we know, that we are wise creatures.
Some beings know something but they don\'t know, that they know it.
However we can wake up these dreamers.
The third beings are those who don\'t know anything but knowing, to know nothing.
But we can educate the uneducated.
And you… a particular special bunch…
You know nothing and do not know to know nothing…
Talking about the condition of mental derangement…
You are a threat for this planet and the solar system.
If I had to bet my knowledge and belongings on a planet and its creatures..
..you would be the last of ones…
Sorry, I\'m just always telling the truth.
Yeah fine, that was a lie.
I tend to an aggressive openness.
..And now..
Back to your colour vision: I have good news and bad news.
First the good one: Earthlings and prime creatures share something in common.
Both of us can perceive colours.
Hmm, let me have a guess. By rule of thumb..
..about 1% of it..
..but for your standards not bad.
Now the bad message: there are no colours.
That\'s right. No colours.
Oh you should see your face derailment.
A short explanation:

string-array.name: test_subject_6_2_intro_main
string-array.item: Do you know what light consists of?

string-array.name: test_subject_6_3a_intro_main
string-array.item: Correct!
Seems like you have an understanding for pictures.
That\'s why we have chosen you as our testsubject :!
I\'m bored, so I will read the answer to the question.

string-array.name: test_subject_6_3b_intro_main
string-array.item: Doesn\'t matter.
As I am a lovely being, I will explain it.

string-array.name: test_subject_6_3c_intro_main
string-array.item: He? Potato salad??
Our chosen earthling seems to have this idea frequently.
WiseMind, you sure about picking up the right creature?
I don\'t know what to do with it..
All this ignorance..
My kindness seems to be endless today: I will share my knowledge with you.

string-array.name: test_subject_6_4_intro_main
string-array.item: Our Dictionary, lesson 58373:
\"Light consists of plasmactronic electromagnetic Zantra radiation.\"
However radiation is not equal colour. Therefore you need corresponding sensory cells.
I\'m talking about your eyes..
The distal stimuli is hit by electromagnetic waves.
A proximal stimuli is absorbed by the oculus.

string-array.name: test_subject_6_5_intro_main
string-array.item: Resulting in perception. Got it?

string-array.name: test_subject_6_intro_nuts
string-array.item: No?
Why do I take all this trouble on me?..
..Sigh.. maybe some electricity is helping to give you new insights.
Maybe unused connections get activated.
I said maybe..
For information on risks and side-effects I have to read the manual instruction and ask WiseMind.

string-array.name: test_subject_6_riddle_solved_candy
string-array.item: Exemplary work
Success
Clever
Brilliant
Amazing
Awesome

string-array.name: test_subject_7_0_intro_main
string-array.item: WiseMind was watching a group of human beings and made a shocking discovery…
Two groups do not have any brain at all.
Oh, it is responding to the words \"no brain\".
Interesting. What does that mean? WiseMind needs to check this.
Back to the topic. A living being without a brain.
Absolutely nothing.
A big void.
How could it survive so long?
I was really shocked for a short moment and dropped my Coverlipida for a second.
Luckily not any creature was nearby.
These human groups: they are possessed by animalic instincts plus they are mentally underdeveloped…
..was that a twitch again..? Doesn\'t matter…
..animalic instincts and mentally underdeveloped creatures.
But animalic is an insult to every living being on this planet which is more intelligent.
Even a stone belongs to that category.
At least they lie around without disturbing anyone.
The human beings mark those groups with directions.. Wait..
..Top.. Button.. nope.. West.. East.. wrong again.
How did they call them…
Hmm, fine I\'m gonna check it.
I have 3 theses for their origin.
There are just no clear answers to it.
For each theses there are 279 possible theories.
For each theory there are 13 possible solutions.
But for each solution there are 7 hypothesis, 65 counter theory, 8 doctrines and 4 figments.
Not to mention the 3038 different opinions!
Or to say it mathematical-philosophical:
An equation with eighthundredtwentyfive unknown factors, thirty-seven dogmas and fifteen neologisms.
Got it?

string-array.name: test_subject_7_intro_nuts
string-array.item: If I interpret your facial expression correctly, yes.
You see WiseMind?!
I think the earthling has finally understood and is happy now.
Look at its smiling face.
Oh wait.. It is upside down.

string-array.name: test_subject_7_riddle_solved_candy
string-array.item: Fantastic
WiseMind says: Not bad
Fascinating
Smart move, earthling
Stunning

string-array.name: test_subject_8_intro_main
string-array.item: Damn, you are beyond the possible level. You have to wait a bit for more :)

string-array.name: test_subject_8_intro_nuts
string-array.item: Damn, you are beyond the possible level. You have to wait a bit for more :)

string-array.name: test_subject_8_riddle_solved_candy
string-array.item: Absolutely brilliant
Perfect
Astonishing
Superior work
Superb
WiseMind says: Awesome

string-array.name: test_subject_9_intro_main
string-array.item: Zurück von den erquickenden Myriaden gescheiter Gedanken.
Zurück zu den trostlosen Forschungen bei unserem Versuchsobjekt.

string-array.name: test_subject_9_intro_nuts
string-array.item: Ich muss dein Gehirn etwas unter Strom setzen.
Stillgelegte Verbindungen werden damit eventuell aktiviert.
Ja, das könnte bedeuten, du wirst intelligenter.
Es könnte.
Wo nichts vorhanden ist, kann auch nichts wachsen.
Ich starte mit 3 Gigavolt.
So.. Kleber hier.. Kabel dort..
Initiiere Stromstoß in 3.. 2..
Was soll denn das schon wieder WiseMind?
Zuviel? Oh.
Ich dachte nicht, dass dich das bisschen Strom grillen würde.
Verzeihung. Du darfst dich bei ihr für den lebensrettenden Eingriff bedanken.
Sag danke.
Warum dreht sich dein großer Zeh im Kreis?
Ich versteh das mal als °Danke WiseMind°.
Aber wieso wachsen auf deinem Gesicht plötzlich grüne Warzen?
Das ist hoffnungslos, du wirst nicht schöner…
Und wieso schlägst du dich selbst? Willst du dir Gutes tun?
Dein Anblick wird für uns nicht erträglicher…
Ach…
Der Strom läuft ja wieder.
Siehst du WiseMind, das Menschenwesen ist glücklich.
Guck doch wie es lächelt.
Oh halt, warte.
Es steht ja auf dem Kopf.

string-array.name: test_subject_9_riddle_solved_candy
string-array.item: Klasse Leistung!
Kluger Zug!
Klasse gemacht!
